content: TITLE: Installing Magento LTS v20 DESCRIPTION: Installs the latest tagged v20 series release of Magento LTS. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/install/use-composer.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer require "openmage/magento-lts":"^20.0.0" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating a New Customer XML Request Example DESCRIPTION: Example XML request body for creating a new customer via POST. Contains the minimum required fields: first name, last name, email, password, website ID, and group ID. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/api/rest/resources/customers.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` Earl Hickey 123123q earl@example.com 1 1 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring API URL Rewrites for Nginx in OpenMage DESCRIPTION: Nginx configuration for URL rewrites in OpenMage to protect API endpoints. This rewrite rule handles all API requests by redirecting them to the main API handler file. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/install/secure-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: nginx CODE: ``` rewrite ^/api/(\w+).*$ /api.php?type=$1 last; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Core Composer Installer for PHP 8 DESCRIPTION: Installs the Magento core composer installer package compatible with PHP 8. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/install/use-composer.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer require "aydin-hassan/magento-core-composer-installer":"~2.1.0" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Enabling Dependency Patching DESCRIPTION: Configures Composer to allow applying patches to magento-lts dependencies. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/install/use-composer.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer config --json extra.enable-patching true ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Core Composer Installer for PHP 7/8 DESCRIPTION: Installs the Magento core composer installer package compatible with both PHP 7 and 8. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/install/use-composer.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer require "aydin-hassan/magento-core-composer-installer":"~2.0.0 || ^2.1.0" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Deleting Customer Data with DELETE Request in Magento API DESCRIPTION: Example of using HTTP DELETE method to remove a customer record from the system via Magento REST API. The request targets a specific customer using their ID (123). SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/api/rest/http_methods.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` DELETE https://om.ddev.site/rest/customers/123 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Up Cron Jobs in DDEV for OpenMage DESCRIPTION: YAML configuration to set up cron jobs for OpenMage using DDEV hooks. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/tools/ddev.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: yml CODE: ``` hooks: post-start: - exec: printf "SHELL=/bin/bash\n* * * * * /var/www/html/cron.sh\n" | crontab ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing openmage-turpentine-varnish Connector in OpenMage DESCRIPTION: This command installs the openmage-turpentine-varnish module, an updated version of the Varnish connector for OpenMage. It integrates Varnish caching with OpenMage for improved performance. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/modules/cache.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer require luigifab/openmage-turpentine-varnish ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Skin Parameter in Error_Processor Class (PHP) DESCRIPTION: This PHP snippet shows how the Error_Processor class constructor uses the 'skin' GET parameter to change the layout. It checks if the 'skin' parameter is set in the URL and calls the _setSkin method accordingly. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/error-pages.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: php CODE: ``` if (isset($_GET['skin'])) { $this->_setSkin($_GET['skin']); } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing magneto-debug Module via Composer DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Magneto Debug module using Composer. This module provides debugging tools for OpenMage, enhancing the development and troubleshooting process. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/modules/log-debug.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer require madalinoprea/magneto-debug ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Filtering Customers by Email in OpenMage API DESCRIPTION: Shows how to filter customers based on their email address using the 'in' operator. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/api/rest/get_filters.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` https://om.ddev.site/api/rest/customers?filter[1][attribute]=email&filter[1][in][0]=ryan@test.com ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Optimizing Composer Autoloader DESCRIPTION: Optimizes the Composer autoloader for production environments to improve class lookup performance. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/install/use-composer.md#2025-04-22_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer dump-autoload --optimize ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Paginating API Results in OpenMage DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to use the 'page' parameter to retrieve a specific page of results from the OpenMage API. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/api/rest/get_filters.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` https://om.ddev.site/api/rest/products?page=1 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Customer Data with GET Request in Magento API DESCRIPTION: Example of using HTTP GET method to retrieve customer information via Magento REST API. The request targets a specific customer using their ID (123). SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/api/rest/http_methods.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET https://om.ddev.site/rest/customers/123 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing AOE_Scheduler Module using Composer DESCRIPTION: This command installs the AOE_Scheduler module as a development dependency using Composer. It requires Composer to be installed and configured for the Magento project. The module provides enhanced cron management capabilities within Magento. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/modules/cron.md#_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer require --dev aoepeople/aoe_scheduler ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing openmage_ignition Module via Composer DESCRIPTION: Command to install the OpenMage spatie-ignition integration module using Composer. This module integrates spatie-ignition with OpenMage for improved error handling and debugging. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/modules/log-debug.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer require empiricompany/openmage_ignition ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Limiting API Results in OpenMage DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to use the 'limit' parameter to restrict the number of items returned in the API response. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/api/rest/get_filters.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` https://om.ddev.site/api/rest/products?limit=2 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Legacy Frontend Themes with Composer DESCRIPTION: Command to install the legacy frontend themes using Composer after their removal from the core OpenMage distribution. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/changelog/index.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: Bash CODE: ``` composer require openmage/legacy-frontend-themes ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing OpenMage Image Cleaner Module DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Image Cleaner module via Composer. This module helps clean up unused or orphaned images in an OpenMage or Magento 1.9 installation. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/modules/images.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer require fballiano/openmage-image-cleaner ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing WebP Image Support for Magento 1.x DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Yireo WebP module via Composer. This module adds WebP image format support to Magento 1.x pages for improved performance and compression. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/modules/images.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer require yireo/magento1-webp ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Mollie Payment Gateway for OpenMage DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Mollie payment gateway via Composer. This module enables payment methods including iDEAL, Creditcard, Bancontact/Mister Cash, SOFORT, Bank transfer, Bitcoin, PayPal & paysafecard for Magento. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/modules/payment.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer require mollie/magento ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Custom Renderers and Filters in OpenMage Grid Columns DESCRIPTION: Shows how to use custom renderer and filter classes for complex column requirements in OpenMage admin grids. Also demonstrates the use of frame_callback and filter_condition_callback for inline customization. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/blog/posts/guides/2025-03-11-brief-guide-on-grid-column.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: PHP CODE: ``` $this->addColumn('custom_field', [ 'header' => $this->__('Custom Field'), 'renderer' => 'Namespace_Module_Block_Adminhtml_Grid_Renderer_Custom', 'filter' => 'Namespace_Module_Block_Adminhtml_Grid_Filter_Custom', ]); // in addColumn() 'frame_callback' => [$this, '_decorateUserUpdatedAt'], 'filter_condition_callback' => [$this, '_findInSet'], // more code /** * @param string $value * @param Varien_Object $row * @param Mage_Adminhtml_Block_Widget_Grid_Column $column * @param bool $isExport * @return string */ protected function _decorateUserUpdatedAt($value, $row, $column, $isExport) { if (!$isExport) { return $value > $row->getAdminUpdatedAt()) ? '' . $value . '' : '' . $value . ''; } return $value; } /** * @param Varien_Data_Collection_Db $collection * @param Mage_Adminhtml_Block_Widget_Grid_Column $column * @return void */ protected function _findInSet($collection, $column) { if ($value = $column->getFilter()->getValue()) { $collection->addFieldToFilter('apply_to', ['finset' => $value]); } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Customer List XML Response Example DESCRIPTION: Example XML response from GET request to retrieve a list of customers. This shows the structure of the customer data returned by the API with basic customer information such as ID, email, name, and creation details. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/api/rest/resources/customers.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` 2 1 test@example.com 1 2012-03-22 14:15:54 1 john Doe Default Store View 4 1 earl@example.com 1 2012-03-28 13:54:04 0 Earl Hickey Admin ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Customer List JSON Response Example DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response from GET request to retrieve a list of customers. Shows the customer data structure including personal information and account settings with customer IDs as object keys. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/api/rest/resources/customers.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "2": { "entity_id": "2", "website_id": "1", "email": "test@example.com", "group_id": "1", "created_at": "2012-03-22 14:15:54", "disable_auto_group_change": "1", "firstname": "john", "lastname": "Doe", "created_in": "Admin", "prefix": null, "suffix": null, "taxvat": null, "dob": "2001-01-03 00:00:00", "reward_update_notification": "1", "reward_warning_notification": "1", "gender": "1" }, "4": { "entity_id": "4", "website_id": "1", "email": "earl@example.com", "group_id": "1", "created_at": "2013-03-28 18:59:41", "disable_auto_group_change": "0", "firstname": "Earl", "lastname": "Hickey", "created_in": "Admin", "prefix": null, "suffix": null, "taxvat": null, "dob": "2012-03-28 13:54:04", "reward_update_notification": "1", "reward_warning_notification": "1", "gender": "1" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Magento Extension Class Maps with N98-magerun in PhpStorm DESCRIPTION: Command to generate PhpStorm metadata for installed Magento extensions using N98-magerun. This creates class maps that improve IDE autocompletion and type hinting. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/tools/phpstorm.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` n98-magerun.phar dev:ide:phpstorm:meta ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Filtering API Results with 'Less Than' in OpenMage DESCRIPTION: Shows how to use the 'lt' filter to return items with attribute values less than a specified value. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/api/rest/get_filters.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` https://om.ddev.site/api/rest/products?filter[1][attribute]=entity_id&filter[1][lt]=4 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Xdebug in DDEV for PHP Debugging DESCRIPTION: Commands to enable/disable Xdebug in DDEV and INI configuration for proper integration with PHPStorm. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/tools/ddev.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` ddev xdebug on ``` LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` ddev xdebug off ``` LANGUAGE: ini CODE: ``` [xdebug] xdebug.mode=debug xdebug.start_with_request=trigger ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Single Customer JSON Response Example DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response from GET request to retrieve a specific customer by ID. Shows customer data structure with basic account information and personal details. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/api/rest/resources/customers.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "entity_id": "2", "website_id": "1", "email": "test@example.com", "group_id": "1", "created_at": "2012-03-22 14:15:54", "disable_auto_group_change": "1", "created_in": "English", "firstname": "john", "lastname": "Doe" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Assigning Product Category Request DESCRIPTION: Example request body for assigning a category to a product, containing the category ID to be assigned. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/api/rest/resources/products/product_categories.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "category_id":"2" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Single Customer XML Response Example DESCRIPTION: Example XML response from GET request to retrieve a specific customer by ID. Shows the structure of individual customer data including account information and personal details. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/api/rest/resources/customers.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` 2 1 test@example.com 1 2012-03-22 14:15:54 1 Default Store View john Doe 2012-03-22 14:15:56 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: PhpStorm SCSS File Watcher Arguments Configuration DESCRIPTION: Configuration string for the Arguments field in PhpStorm's File Watcher settings to process SCSS files and output CSS files in the same directory. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/tools/phpstorm.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` $FileName$:$FileParentDir$/$FileNameWithoutExtension$.css ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Filtering Products by Description in OpenMage API DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to filter products based on their description attribute using the 'in' operator. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/api/rest/get_filters.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` https://om.ddev.site/api/rest/products/?order=entity_id&filter[0][attribute]=description&filter[0][in][0]=simple01 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing openmage-lesti-fpc Simple Full-Page Cache Module in OpenMage DESCRIPTION: This command installs the openmage-lesti-fpc module, which provides a simple full-page caching solution for OpenMage. It uses Composer to manage the installation process. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/modules/cache.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer require fballiano/openmage-lesti-fpc ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Stock Item Information in JSON Format DESCRIPTION: Example of a successful API call response in JSON format, showing stock item details including item ID, product ID, stock ID, quantity, and low stock date. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/api/rest/response_formats.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` [{"item_id":"1","product_id":"1","stock_id":"1","qty":"99.0000","low_stock_date":null},{"item_id":"2","product_id":"2","stock_id":"1","qty":"100.0000","low_stock_date":null}] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing phpMyAdmin Add-on in DDEV DESCRIPTION: Command to install the phpMyAdmin add-on for DDEV and launch it in the browser. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/tools/ddev.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` ddev get ddev/ddev-phpmyadmin ``` LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` ddev phpmyadmin ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Listing New Events in OpenMage Magento LTS DESCRIPTION: This markdown snippet lists new events added to the OpenMage Magento LTS project, including their names, purposes, and related pull requests. It covers events for admin forms, order processing, application lifecycle, and sitemap generation. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/changelog/new-events.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` # New Events ## `adminhtml_block_widget_form_init_form_values_after` New event after data set on a form. ([#1485](https://github.com/OpenMage/magento-lts/pull/1485)) ## `adminhtml_block_widget_tabs_html_before` New event for adding custom tab. ([#1358](https://github.com/OpenMage/magento-lts/pull/1358)) ## `adminhtml_sales_order_create_save_before` New event when editing an order. ([#1168](https://github.com/OpenMage/magento-lts/pull/1168)) ## `core_app_run_after` Ended the request (and close the session) before `core_app_run_after` event. ([#1592](https://github.com/OpenMage/magento-lts/pull/1592)) ## `sitemap_cms_pages_generating_before` Made sitemap more flexible. ([#1854](https://github.com/OpenMage/magento-lts/pull/1854)) ## `sitemap_urlset_generating_before` Made sitemap more flexible. ([#1854](https://github.com/OpenMage/magento-lts/pull/1854)) [Full list of events](../events/list.md) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing OpenMage with Docker Compose DESCRIPTION: Command to clone OpenMage repository and run installation using Docker Compose. Creates a new Docker Compose project named 'openmage'. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/tools/oneline.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` git clone https://github.com/OpenMage/magento-lts.git && cd magento-lts && dev/openmage/install.sh ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Custom Backend URL in OpenMage DESCRIPTION: XML configuration example for changing the backend URL path in OpenMage by editing the app/etc/local.xml file. This configuration sets the admin path which should be changed from the default 'admin' to something unique for security. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/install/secure-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Debugging Magento Events with Xdebug (PHP) DESCRIPTION: This PHP snippet demonstrates a debugging technique for Magento events using Xdebug. By setting a breakpoint within the `dispatchEvent` method of the `Mage` class, developers can inspect the event name and data before it is dispatched, which helps in understanding the event flow. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/blog/posts/guides/2022-08-17-observer.md#_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: php CODE: ``` public static function dispatchEvent($name, array $data = []) { Varien_Profiler::start('DISPATCH EVENT:' . $name); $result = self::app()->dispatchEvent($name, $data); Varien_Profiler::stop('DISPATCH EVENT:' . $name); return $result; } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Filtering API Results with 'Not Equal To' in OpenMage DESCRIPTION: Shows how to use the 'neq' filter to exclude items with a specific attribute value from the API results. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/api/rest/get_filters.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` https://om.ddev.site/api/rest/products?filter[1][attribute]=entity_id&filter[1][neq]=3 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Cm_Diehard Full-Page Cache Module in OpenMage DESCRIPTION: This command installs the Cm_Diehard full-page cache module for OpenMage using Composer. Cm_Diehard is a comprehensive full-page caching solution for Magento-based systems. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/modules/cache.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer require colinmollenhour/cm_diehard ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Filtering API Results with 'Not In' Operator in OpenMage DESCRIPTION: Shows how to use the 'nin' filter to exclude items with specific attribute values from the API results. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/api/rest/get_filters.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` https://om.ddev.site/api/rest/products?filter[1][attribute]=entity_id&filter[1][nin]=3 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing openmage-defer-javascripts Module via Composer DESCRIPTION: Command to install the fballiano/openmage-defer-javascripts module using Composer. This maintained fork provides JavaScript deferring functionality and Google reCaptcha integration compatible with the latest versions of OpenMage LTS. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/modules/frontend.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer require fballiano/openmage-defer-javascripts ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Mage_PageCache Module with Composer DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Mage_PageCache module using Composer after its removal from the core OpenMage distribution. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/changelog/index.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: Bash CODE: ``` composer require openmage/module-mage-pagecache ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Mage_Poll Module with Composer DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Mage_Poll module using Composer after its removal from the core OpenMage distribution. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/changelog/index.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: Bash CODE: ``` composer require openmage/module-mage-poll ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing PayPal Pay Later Banner Module for OpenMage DESCRIPTION: Command to install the PayPal Pay Later Messages module via Composer. This module renders PayPal Pay Later messages on product and cart pages for Magento 1/OpenMage. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/modules/payment.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer require empiricompany/openmage-paypal-pay-later-banner-info ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Perfect_Watermarks ImageMagick Adapter for OpenMage DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Perfect_Watermarks module via Composer. This module replaces OpenMage's default GD2 image adapter with ImageMagick for better watermarking capabilities. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/modules/images.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer require colinmollenhour/perfect_watermarks ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing MkDocs and Plugins via pip3 (Bash) DESCRIPTION: This command installs MkDocs along with the Material theme and additional plugins using pip3. These are necessary components for building and customizing the documentation. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/mkdocs.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pip3 install mkdocs mkdocs-material mkdocs-minify-plugin mkdocs-redirects ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing a Magento Observer (PHP) DESCRIPTION: This PHP snippet shows how to implement a Magento observer class that handles the 'customer_login' event. The `yourMethod` function is executed when the event is dispatched, and it receives a `Varien_Event_Observer` object containing event data. In this example, the customer data is extracted from the observer object. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/blog/posts/guides/2022-08-17-observer.md#_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: php CODE: ``` class YourNamespace_YourModule_Model_Observer { // EVENT customer_login public function yourMethod(Varien_Event_Observer $observer) { $customer = $observer->getData('customer'); } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing SMTP Pro Extension via Composer for Magento 1 DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to install the 'aschroder/Magento-SMTP-Pro-Email-Extension' using Composer. This free and open-source extension allows easy configuration of SMTP settings for Magento 1.x, supporting various email providers and offering features like configuration testing and email logging. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/modules/email.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer require aschroder/smtp_pro ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing reCaptcha Module DESCRIPTION: This command installs the `proxiblue/recaptcha` module, a Google reCaptcha integration for OpenMage. Note that this particular module may not be directly available on Packagist and may require adding a repository to your composer.json or using a forked repository. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/modules/captcha.md#_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer require proxiblue/recaptcha ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Cloudflare Turnstile Module DESCRIPTION: This command installs the `fballiano/openmage-cloudflare-turnstile` module, which integrates Cloudflare's Turnstile CAPTCHA alternative into the OpenMage platform. It uses Composer to fetch and install the module from the specified package. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/modules/captcha.md#_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer require fballiano/openmage-cloudflare-turnstile ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Generating JSON Error Response in Magento API DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the structure of a JSON error response from the Magento API. It contains the HTTP status code and error message in a compact JSON format. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/api/rest/common_http_status_codes.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` {"messages":{"error":[{"code":404,"message":"Resource not found."}]}} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Core Composer Installer for PHP 7 DESCRIPTION: Installs the Magento core composer installer package compatible with PHP 7. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/install/use-composer.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer require "aydin-hassan/magento-core-composer-installer":"^2.0.0" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring robots.txt for Magento LTS DESCRIPTION: This robots.txt configuration sets up crawling rules for search engines on a Magento LTS installation. It includes a crawl delay, allows specific URL patterns, and disallows access to various system and dynamic content areas. The file also provides commented sections for customization, such as sitemap declaration and media indexing rules for specific bots. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/samples/robots-txt.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` ############################################ ## For more information about the robots.txt standard visit ## http://www.robotstxt.org/orig.html ## ## For syntax checking visit ## http://tool.motoricerca.info/robots-checker.phtml ############################################ ## Crawl the Sitemap. Set the correct URL before uncomment # Sitemap: https://example.com/sitemap.xml ############################################ ## Crawlers Setup User-agent: * ## How many seconds a crawler should wait before loading and crawling page content ## Set a custom crawl rate if you are experiencing traffic issues with your server ## https://www.contentkingapp.com/academy/robotstxt/faq/crawl-delay-10/ Crawl-delay: 10 ############################################ ## Allow to crawl paging (paging inside a listing with more params are disallowed below) Allow: /*?p= ############################################ ## Do not crawl non-SEF paths and generated content (if you use a store id in URL you must prefix with * or copy for each store) Disallow: */index.php/ Disallow: */catalog/product_compare/ Disallow: */catalog/category/view/ Disallow: */catalog/product/view/ Disallow: */catalog/product/gallery/ Disallow: */catalogsearch/ #Allow: */catalogsearch/seo_sitemap #Allow: */catalogsearch/term/popular Disallow: */checkout/ Disallow: */control/ Disallow: */contacts/ Disallow: */customer/ Disallow: */customize/ Disallow: */newsletter/ Disallow: */poll/ Disallow: */review/ Disallow: */sales/ Disallow: */sendfriend/ Disallow: */tag/ Disallow: */wishlist/ ############################################ ## Do not crawl dynamic filters. Uncomment what you need or add custom filters Disallow: /*?dir* Disallow: /*?limit* Disallow: /*?mode* Disallow: /*?price=* Disallow: /*?___from_store=* Disallow: /*?___store=* Disallow: /*?q=* # Disallow: /*?cat=* # Disallow: /*?availability=* # Disallow: /*?brand=* ############################################ ## Do not crawl paths that can be safely ignored by search engines (no clean URLs) Disallow: /*?p=*& Disallow: /*.php$ Disallow: /*?SID= ############################################ ## Do not allow media indexing for the following bots ## Disallow all or add custom paths. For example */media/ or */skin/ # User-agent: baiduspider-image # Disallow: / # Disallow: */media/ # Disallow: */skin/ # User-agent: baiduspider-video # Disallow: / # Disallow: */media/ # Disallow: */skin/ # User-agent: msnbot-media # Disallow: / # Disallow: */media/ # Disallow: */skin/ # User-agent: Googlebot-Image # Disallow: / # Disallow: */media/ # Disallow: */skin/ # User-agent: Googlebot-Video # Disallow: / # Disallow: */media/ # Disallow: */skin/ ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing SCSS for PhpStorm File Watcher DESCRIPTION: Command to install SCSS globally via npm, which is required for setting up the SCSS file watcher in PhpStorm. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/tools/phpstorm.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm install -g sass ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Mage_Backup Module with Composer DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Mage_Backup module using Composer after its removal from the core OpenMage distribution. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/changelog/index.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: Bash CODE: ``` composer require openmage/module-mage-backup ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Initializing New Composer Project DESCRIPTION: Creates a new Composer project in the current directory. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/install/use-composer.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer init ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Composer for Custom Patches in JSON DESCRIPTION: Example composer.json configuration that defines a patch to be applied to a third-party package. This shows how to specify the package, provide a descriptive name for the patch, and reference the patch file location. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/blog/posts/guides/2023-05-01-customize-your-openmage.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "require": { "vendor/package": "1.0.0" }, "extra": { "patches": { "vendor/package": { "Fix Bug #1234": "patches/fix-bug-1234.patch" } } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Magento LTS v19 DESCRIPTION: Installs the legacy v19 tagged release of Magento LTS (1.9.4.x drop-in replacement). SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/install/use-composer.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer require "openmage/magento-lts":"^19.4.0" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating a New MkDocs Project (Bash) DESCRIPTION: This command creates a new MkDocs project in the specified directory. It sets up the initial project structure and configuration files. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/mkdocs.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` mkdocs new [dir-name] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Remote Patch URL in Composer JSON DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to configure composer.json to download and apply a patch directly from a GitHub PR URL at runtime, rather than storing the patch file locally. This allows for dynamically applying patches from remote sources. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/blog/posts/guides/2023-05-01-customize-your-openmage.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "...": "...", "extra": { "patches": { "openmage/magento-lts": { "Added form key validation to Contacts form #3146": "https://github.com/OpenMage/magento-lts/pull/3146.patch" } } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing HoneySpam Module DESCRIPTION: This command installs the `magento-hackathon/HoneySpam` module, which provides spam protection for various forms using honey pots within the OpenMage system. It utilizes Composer to retrieve and install the module. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/modules/captcha.md#_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer require magento-hackathon/honeyspam ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Enabling Developer Mode in DDEV for OpenMage DESCRIPTION: YAML configuration to enable Developer Mode in OpenMage by setting environment variables in DDEV. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/tools/ddev.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: yml CODE: ``` web_environment: [ MAGE_IS_DEVELOPER_MODE=1 ] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Magento Root Directory DESCRIPTION: Sets the root directory where magento-lts will be installed. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/install/use-composer.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer config extra.magento-root-dir pub ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting and Launching DDEV Environment DESCRIPTION: Commands to start the DDEV environment and launch the OpenMage application in a browser with secure HTTPS connection. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/blog/posts/guides/2024-02-17-ddev-windows-10.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` ddev start ddev launch ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Specifying PHP Version DESCRIPTION: Sets the target PHP version for dependency resolution, ensuring correct package versions are installed. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/install/use-composer.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer config platform.php 8.4 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Filtering API Results with Date Range in OpenMage DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to use the 'from' and 'to' filters to return items within a specific range of attribute values. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/api/rest/get_filters.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` https://om.ddev.site/api/rest/products?filter[1][attribute]=entity_id&filter[1][from]=1&filter[1][to]=3 ``` LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` https://om.ddev.site/api/rest/products?filter[1][attribute]=price&filter[1][from]=150&filter[1][to]=350 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Launching Mailpit in DDEV DESCRIPTION: Command to launch Mailpit, an email testing tool, in the browser within DDEV environment. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/tools/ddev.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` ddev mailpit ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding Basic Columns to OpenMage Admin Grid DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to add various types of columns to an admin grid, including ID, name, date, and status columns with different attributes and options. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/blog/posts/guides/2025-03-11-brief-guide-on-grid-column.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: PHP CODE: ``` protected function _prepareColumns() { $this->addColumn('entity_id', [ 'header' => $this->__('ID'), 'align' => 'right', 'width' => '50px', 'index' => 'entity_id', 'type' => 'number', 'sortable' => true, ]); $this->addColumn('name', [ 'header' => $this->__('Name'), 'index' => 'name', 'type' => 'text', 'copyable' => true, ]); $this->addColumn('created_at', [ 'header' => $this->__('Created At'), 'index' => 'created_at', 'type' => 'datetime', 'filter' => true, 'sortable' => true, ]); $this->addColumn('status', [ 'header' => $this->__('Status'), 'index' => 'status', 'type' => 'options', 'options' => [ 1 => 'Enabled', 0 => 'Disabled', ], ]); return parent::_prepareColumns(); } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Generating Patch Files from Git Branches DESCRIPTION: Git command example showing how to generate a single patch file containing all changes from a feature branch compared to the main branch. The example uses git format-patch with the triple-dot notation to combine all commits into one patch file. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/blog/posts/guides/2023-05-01-customize-your-openmage.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` git format-patch origin/main...some-feature --stdout > patches/some-feature.patch ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Stock Item Information in XML Format DESCRIPTION: Example of a successful API call response in XML format, showing stock item details including item ID, product ID, stock ID, quantity, and low stock date. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/api/rest/response_formats.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` 1 1 1 99.0000 2 2 1 100.0000 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sorting API Results in OpenMage DESCRIPTION: Shows how to use the 'order' and 'dir' parameters to sort API results in ascending or descending order based on a specific attribute. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/api/rest/get_filters.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` https://om.ddev.site/api/rest/products?order=name&dir=dsc ``` LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` https://om.ddev.site/api/rest/products?order=name&dir=asc ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Generating Patches with symplify/vendor-patches DESCRIPTION: Shell commands demonstrating how to use the symplify/vendor-patches tool to generate a patch file from changes made to a vendor file. This workflow shows installing the tool, creating a backup of the original file, modifying it, and generating the patch. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/blog/posts/guides/2023-05-01-customize-your-openmage.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` composer require symplify/vendor-patches --dev cp vendor/app/Mage.php vendor/app/Mage.php.old # modify app/Mage.php to your liking vendor/bin/vendor-patches generate composer install ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Handling Whitespace in API Filter Values in OpenMage DESCRIPTION: Shows how to encode whitespace in filter values using '%20' when making API requests. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/api/rest/get_filters.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` https://om.ddev.site/api/rest/products?filter[1][attribute]=name&filter[1][in]=BlackBerry%208100%20Pearl ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running n98-magerun with DDEV in OpenMage Magento LTS DESCRIPTION: Example of running the n98-magerun system information command using DDEV as a prefix. This command prints information about the current OpenMage system. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/tools/n98-magerun.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` ddev magerun sys:info ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing vianetz/matomo-magento1 Extension via Composer DESCRIPTION: This command installs the vianetz/matomo-magento1 extension using Composer. The extension allows integration of Matomo analytics with Magento 1 for tracking e-commerce transaction data. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/users/modules/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` composer require vianetz/matomo-magento1 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Common Docker Compose Commands for OpenMage DESCRIPTION: Set of useful Docker Compose commands for managing OpenMage installation, including composer, magerun, and database operations. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/tools/oneline.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` $ docker compose run --rm -u $(id -u):$(id -g) cli composer show $ docker compose run --rm -u $(id -u):$(id -g) cli bash $ docker compose run --rm cli magerun sys:check $ docker compose run --rm cli magerun cache:clean $ docker compose run --rm cli magerun db:console $ docker compose exec mysql mysql ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring WSL Memory and CPU Limits DESCRIPTION: Example WSL configuration file (.wslconfig) to set resource limits for the WSL2 virtual machine, including memory and processor allocation. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/blog/posts/guides/2024-02-17-ddev-windows-10.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: ini CODE: ``` [wsl2] memory=4GB # Limits VM memory in WSL 2 up to 4 GB processors=6 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Correcting Argument Order for implode() Function Calls in PHP DESCRIPTION: Fixes the order of arguments in implode() function calls to match the expected syntax. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/blog/posts/releases/2020-01-30-release-19-4-1.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: PHP CODE: ``` implode() ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring DDEV for OpenMage DESCRIPTION: Example DDEV configuration (config.yaml) showing how to customize PHP version and webserver type for OpenMage development environment. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/blog/posts/guides/2024-02-17-ddev-windows-10.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: ini CODE: ``` php_version: "8.3" webserver_type: apache-fpm ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Compass in DDEV for SCSS Compilation DESCRIPTION: Dockerfile instructions to install Compass, a CSS authoring framework, in the DDEV environment. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/tools/ddev.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: dockerfile CODE: ``` ARG BASE_IMAGE FROM $BASE_IMAGE RUN apt-get update RUN DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y -o Dpkg::Options::="--force-confold" --no-install-recommends --no-install-suggests build-essential ruby-full rubygems RUN gem install compass ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Custom DDEV Command for PHPStan DESCRIPTION: Bash script to create a custom DDEV command for running PHPStan, a PHP static analysis tool. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/tools/ddev.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` #!/bin/bash ## Description: run PHPStan ## Usage: phpstan ## Example: ddev phpstan php vendor/bin/phpstan analyze -c .github/phpstan.neon "$@" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Customer List URL in REST API (URL) DESCRIPTION: URL for retrieving the list of customers via REST API. This operation is typically restricted to Admin user types. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/blog/posts/releases/2020-01-30-release-19-4-1.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: PHP CODE: ``` validate_formkey_checkout = 1 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Simple XML Error to JSON Transformation DESCRIPTION: Demonstration of how a simple XML error structure is transformed into its JSON equivalent. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/api/rest/response_formats.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` 404 Resource not found. ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` {"messages":{"error":[{"code":404,"message":"Resource not found."}]}} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: XML Configuration for Admin Grid Columns DESCRIPTION: Implementation of unified admin grid columns with XML-based configuration SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/blog/posts/releases/2024-12-20-release-20-11-0.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: XML CODE: ``` addCss/addJs ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Admin RSS Order Period Configuration DESCRIPTION: Configuration path for setting new order period in admin RSS feeds. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/changelog/new-config.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: yaml CODE: ``` rss/admin_order/new_period ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: PhpStorm SCSS File Watcher Output Paths Configuration DESCRIPTION: Configuration string for the Output paths to refresh field in PhpStorm's File Watcher settings. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/tools/phpstorm.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` $FilePare ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Python3 and pip3 for MkDocs (Bash) DESCRIPTION: These commands update the package list and install Python 3.8 and pip3 on a Debian-based system. This is a prerequisite for installing MkDocs. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/tools/ddev.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` ddev get ddev/ddev-browsersync ddev restart ddev browsersync ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Backend Global Search Configuration DESCRIPTION: Configuration option to enable or disable global search functionality in the admin backend. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/changelog/new-config.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: yaml CODE: ``` admin/global_search/enable ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering Custom Block in CMS Static Block (HTML) DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to include a custom block in a CMS static block using Magento's block directive. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/developers/changelog/new-config.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: yaml CODE: ``` catalog/product_image/progressive_threshold ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Searching for WSDL Files with Magento Namespace in Bash DESCRIPTION: This Bash command searches recursively for XML files containing the string 'urn:Magento', which helps identify WSDL files that need to be updated to the new OpenMage namespace. It's intended to be run from the root directory of the OpenMage project. SOURCE: https://github.com/openmage/magento-lts/blob/main/docs/content/blog/posts/releases/2024-05-29-release-20-9-0.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: yaml CODE: ``` --- title: Release v20.9.0 draft: false date: 2024-05-29 comments: true authors: - fballiano categories: - Releases v20 tags: - UPS REST API hide: - toc --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring MkDocs Page Settings in YAML DESCRIPTION: YAML front matter configuration that hides the table of contents (toc) for this documentation page.
